title: 2D and 3D Vector Visualization

creator: Claude AI
subject: Linear Algebra
Vectors
Coordinate Systems

learningObjectives: Understand how component values determine vector position and direction
Visualize vector projections onto coordinate axes

controls.name: X Component
controls.description: Controls the x-component of the vector

controls.name: Y Component
controls.description: Controls the y-component of the vector

controls.name: Z Component

controls.name: Show Projections
controls.description: Toggles visibility of projection lines to axes

controls.name: Show Labels
controls.description: Toggles visibility of component and axis labels
